title: Dispatch Haul Truck
description: A mine dispatcher in the control room receives a request from a shovel and dispatches the nearest available haul truck to be loaded.

tasks.description: Receive an automated 'Ready to Load' signal from Shovel SH-101 in the Fleet Management System (FMS).
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher is alerted that the shovel is ready for a truck.

tasks.description: Identify the nearest available haul truck (HT-55) that is currently empty.
tasks.expected_outcome: The optimal truck is selected to minimize shovel wait time.

tasks.description: Send a dispatch instruction to the operator of HT-55 to proceed to Shovel SH-101 for loading.
tasks.expected_outcome: The truck driver receives and accepts the dispatch instruction on their in-cab screen.
